title: The Transcenders
description: I refined my frontend skills by building responsive and interactive interfaces from scratch. I learned how to handle dynamic updates and create a smooth, user-friendly experience. This project sharpened my problem-solving skills by pushing me to optimize performance as well.

title: UI-Design Training
description: I learned how to create functional and visually appealing user interfaces by using HTML, CSS and by having the core UI design principles in mind. I built responsive layouts with images and adaptive navigation, while enhancing interactivity through animations, shadows and gradients, too.

title: 2D Fractals
description: In this project I created mesmerizing fractals, including the Julia set, Mandelbrot set and the Burning Ship set. Additionally, it allowed me to combine mathematics with computer graphics and develop a deeper appreciation for visual programming.
